languages.text: "Нам не хватает очищенного воздуха. Сейчас он проходит три священных цикла фильтрации, но... Это долго. Если бы священный цикл был всего один, но... будет ли это таким возмутительным отступлением от устава санитарного обслуживания? С учетом обстоятельств..."

traits.locale_text: "Нам не хватает очищенного воздуха. Сейчас он проходит три священных цикла фильтрации, но... Это долго. Если бы священный цикл был всего один, но... будет ли это таким возмутительным отступлением от устава санитарного обслуживания? С учетом обстоятельств..."

languages.text: "We are short on purified air. It currently goes through three sacred cycles of filtration but... that takes a long time. Would a single sacred cycle be... too egregious of a departure from the sanitation code? The circumstances being what they are..."

languages.text: "Wir haben kaum noch gereinigte Luft. Momentan gibt es drei heilige Filtrationszyklen, aber ... das dauert eine Weile. Wäre ein einziger Zyklus ... eine zu empörende Abkehr vom Sanitärkodex? Angesichts der aktuellen Umstände ..."
languages.original_text: "We are short on purified air. It currently goes through three sacred cycles of filtration but... that takes a long time. Would a single sacred cycle be... too egregious of a departure from the sanitation code? The circumstances being what they are..."

traits.locale_text: "Das Modul hat kaum noch gereinigte Luft. Momentan gibt es drei heilige Filtrationszyklen, aber ... das dauert eine Weile. Wäre ein einziger Zyklus ... eine zu empörende Abkehr vom Sanitärkodex? Angesichts der aktuellen Umstände ..."

languages.text: « Nous manquons d'air purifié. Celui que nous respirons passe certes par trois cycles de filtration sacrés, mais... c'est un processus particulièrement long. Un seul cycle sacré constituerait-il... une violation trop flagrante du code sanitaire ? Les circonstances étant ce qu'elles sont... »
languages.original_text: "We are short on purified air. It currently goes through three sacred cycles of filtration but... that takes a long time. Would a single sacred cycle be... too egregious of a departure from the sanitation code? The circumstances being what they are..."

traits.locale_text: « La baie manque d'air purifié. Celui que nous respirons passe certes par trois cycles de filtration sacrés, mais... c'est un processus particulièrement long. Un seul cycle sacré constituerait-il... une violation trop flagrante du code sanitaire ? Les circonstances étant ce qu'elles sont... »

languages.text: «El aire puro escasea aquí. Actualmente circula por tres ciclos sagrados de filtración, pero... tardan mucho en completarse. ¿Quizá un solo ciclo sagrado suponga... una desviación excesiva del código sanitario? Teniendo en cuenta las circunstancias...».
languages.original_text: "We are short on purified air. It currently goes through three sacred cycles of filtration but... that takes a long time. Would a single sacred cycle be... too egregious of a departure from the sanitation code? The circumstances being what they are..."

traits.locale_text: «El aire puro escasea en este compartimento. Actualmente circula por tres ciclos sagrados de filtración, pero... tardan mucho en completarse. ¿Quizá un solo ciclo sagrado suponga... una desviación excesiva del código sanitario? Teniendo en cuenta las circunstancias...».

languages.text: 「浄化された空気が足りていません。現在、濾過には3神聖サイクルを経ていますが…時間がかかるのです。神聖サイクルを1回にするのは…衛生基準から逸脱しすぎませんか？事情が事情だけに…」
languages.original_text: "We are short on purified air. It currently goes through three sacred cycles of filtration but... that takes a long time. Would a single sacred cycle be... too egregious of a departure from the sanitation code? The circumstances being what they are..."

traits.locale_text: 「ベイには浄化された空気が足りていません。現在、濾過には3神聖サイクルを経ていますが…時間がかかるのです。神聖サイクルを1回にするのは…衛生基準から逸脱しすぎませんか？事情が事情だけに…」

languages.text: “我们这边缺少净化过的空气。目前，所有空气都需要经过三次神圣过滤循环才能使用……这会花费很长时间。如果只进行一次神圣循环的话……这或许严重违背了卫生法规把？不过，如果情况不得不如此的话……”
languages.original_text: "We are short on purified air. It currently goes through three sacred cycles of filtration but... that takes a long time. Would a single sacred cycle be... too egregious of a departure from the sanitation code? The circumstances being what they are..."

traits.locale_text: “这片甲板缺乏净化过的空气。目前，所有空气都需要经过三次神圣过滤循环才能使用……这会花费很长时间。如果只进行一次神圣循环的话……这会不会过于偏离卫生法规了？但如果情况不得不如此的话……”

languages.text: "Yeteri kadar temiz havamız yok. Mevcut durumda üç kutsal filtre döngüsünden geçiyor ama... Bu çok uzun vakit alıyor. Tek bir kutsal döngü olsa... Sağlık kodundan çok mu sapmış oluruz? Vaziyet böyle olunca..."
languages.original_text: "We are short on purified air. It currently goes through three sacred cycles of filtration but... that takes a long time. Would a single sacred cycle be... too egregious of a departure from the sanitation code? The circumstances being what they are..."
